issue.title: [CF 164] Nefarian Encounter Question
issue.body:
I'm using a custom UI that doesn't allow to me to show the alt power bar of onyxia in the nefarian encounter...

I'm using TellmeWhen since you re-edited the project and i was wondering about building a 10icons tmw bar to show the energy of onyxia since i saw you inserted in the conditions the possibility to check the alt.Power of player/target etc etc...

So i'm creating 10 icons and setting up in the conditions that the icon should be show up only when Atl.Power of my focus is between 0 and 10 .. 10 and 20 .. 20 and 30 and so on.

Do you think it can works?
I just have a question .. i can setup the conditions with logic operator AND, but which icon type should i choose to be able to choose an icon to show up when the conditions are satisfied?  i wish to show the lifeblood icon when the conditions are satisfied...


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77 | Imported from CurseForge issue #164 | Raw

comments.body:
Hmm. While this probably is not the best method to do this, you could create a cooldown icon, using the spellID of lifeblood as the cooldown to track, and set it to always show. Keep the timer and mana/range check options off, of course.

I think I will add an icon type that allows you to specify a custom texture/solid color, the only purpose of which is to check conditions.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I saw the new icon type. TY very much i tried yesterday in raid and it works like a charm :)


> Posted by CurseForge user Adam77
